RitualPatternDef.ritualExplanation: Success or failure chances depend on using an altar and number of participants. If everything goes well, the flogged slave will have their suppression locked at max for several days.

PreceptDef.label: flogging ritual
PreceptDef.description: A gathering where a slave is bound and beaten with a whip or cane. The target slave will be wounded, and become terrified and broken for a long time, depending on the quality. Spectating slaves will become afraid and intimidated, and colonists will feel exhilarated or disgusted depending on their beliefs. There is a risk of the target slave dying.
